PROFILE_SETTINGS.TITLE: Profile Settings
PROFILE_SETTINGS.AVATAR_DELETE_FAILED: An error occurred while deleting the profile image, please try again.
PROFILE_SETTINGS.AFTER_EMAIL_CHANGED: Profile updated successfully. Please log in again as your login credentials have been changed.

PROFILE_SECTION.TITLE: Profile
PROFILE_SECTION.NOTE: Set up your individual account details.

SEND_MESSAGE.TITLE: Hotkey to send messages
SEND_MESSAGE.NOTE: Choose a hotkey to send your messages, based on your preferred writing style.

ENTER_KEY.HEADING: Enter (↵)
ENTER_KEY.CONTENT: Send messages instantly with the Enter key shortcut.

CMD_ENTER_KEY.HEADING: Cmd/Ctrl + Enter (⌘ + ↵)
CMD_ENTER_KEY.CONTENT: Send messages instantly with the Cmd/Ctrl + Enter key shortcut.

MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.TITLE: Personal message signature
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.NOTE: Personalize your emails and leave a lasting impression with a custom signature, easily created using the rich content editor. This signature will be added to every message you send from your email inbox.
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.API_ERROR: An error occurred while saving signature, please try again.

MESSAGE_SIGNATURE.LABEL: Message signature
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE.PLACEHOLDER: Take a deep breath and start crafting your email signature here. You can include your title, social media links, contact deets, and, maybe, a touch of humor?

PASSWORD_SECTION.TITLE: Password
PASSWORD_SECTION.NOTE: Updating your password will reset your logins on multiple devices.

ACCESS_TOKEN.TITLE: Access token
ACCESS_TOKEN.NOTE: Copy the following token when building an API-based integration.

AUDIO_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: Audio notifications
AUDIO_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.NOTE: Get audio alerts in the dashboard for new messages and conversations.

CONDITIONS.TITLE: Alert conditions:
CONDITIONS.CONDITION_ONE: Receive audio alerts only when the Chatwoot window is not active in your browser.
CONDITIONS.CONDITION_TWO: Receive audio alerts every 30 seconds until all the assigned conversations have been read.

EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: Email notifications
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.NOTE: Update your email notification preferences here.
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNMENT: Get email notifications when a conversation is assigned to me.
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_CREATION: Get email notifications when a new conversation is created.
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_MENTION: Get email notifications I am mentioned in a conversation.
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.ASSIGNED_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Get email notifications for new messages in conversations assigned to me.
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.PARTICIPATING_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Get email notifications when a new message is created in a participating conversation.

API.UPDATE_ERROR: An error occurred while updating your preferences, please try again.

PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: Push notifications
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.NOTE: Update your push notification preferences here.
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNMENT: Get push notifications when a conversation is assigned to me.
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_CREATION: Get push notifications when a new conversation is created.
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_MENTION: Get push notifications when I am mentioned in a conversation.
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.ASSIGNED_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Get push notifications for new messages in conversations assigned to me.
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.HAS_ENABLED_PUSH: You have enabled push notifications for this browser.
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.PARTICIPATING_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Get push notifications when a message is created in a participating conversation.

NAME.LABEL: Your full name
NAME.ERROR: Please enter a valid full name.

DISPLAY_NAME.LABEL: Display name
DISPLAY_NAME.ERROR: Please enter a valid display name.
DISPLAY_NAME.PLACEHOLDER: This will appear as your name in conversations.

AVAILABILITY.LABEL: Availability
AVAILABILITY.SET_AVAILABILITY_ERROR: An error occurred while setting availability, please try again.

EMAIL.LABEL: Your email address
EMAIL.ERROR: Please enter a valid email address.

PASSWORD.LABEL: New password
PASSWORD.ERROR: Please provide a password of at least 6 characters.

PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION.LABEL: Confirm new password
PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION.ERROR: Confirm password should match the entered password.
PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION.PLACEHOLDER: Confirm your new password by re-entering it.

SIDEBAR_ITEMS.SELECTOR_SUBTITLE: Select an account from the following list.

ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED.TITLE: Account suspended
ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED.MESSAGE: Your account is suspended. Please reach out to the support team for more information.

FILE_BUBBLE.INSTAGRAM_STORY_UNAVAILABLE: This story is no longer available.

SIDEBAR.FACEBOOK_REAUTHORIZE: Your Facebook connection has expired, please reconnect your Facebook page to continue services

SET_AUTO_OFFLINE.INFO_TEXT: Let the system automatically mark you as offline when you aren't using the app or dashboard.

BILLING_SETTINGS.TITLE: Billing

CURRENT_PLAN.TITLE: Current plan
CURRENT_PLAN.PLAN_NOTE: You are currently subscribed to the **%{plan}** plan with **%{quantity}** licenses.

MANAGE_SUBSCRIPTION.TITLE: Manage your subscription
MANAGE_SUBSCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: View your previous invoices, edit your billing details, or cancel your subscription.

CHAT_WITH_US.TITLE: Need help?
CHAT_WITH_US.DESCRIPTION: Are you facing any issues in billing? We are here to help.

BILLING_SETTINGS.NO_BILLING_USER: Your billing account is being set up. Please refresh the page and try again.

CREATE_ACCOUNT.NO_ACCOUNT_WARNING: Uh oh! We could not find any Chatwoot accounts. Please create a new account to continue.

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not connect to Woot server, please try again.

TITLE.MOVE_TO_NEXT_TAB: Move to next tab in conversation list
TITLE.SWITCH_CONVERSATION_STATUS: Switch to the next conversation status
